objectives_summary: Build animated films and cartoons by compiling  a series of still images (frames). Will also be versed in using animation for video games, interactive media,  event reconstruction and many other uses.
Learn how to explain difficult concepts in a visual way.

items.headline: Go through my process from start to finish in creating this Scifi Ship
objectives_summary: Show different techniques in creating a Spaceship in Blender

objectives_summary: Have an understanding of ZBrush
Be able to produce speed sculpt quickly
Get there ideas down fast

Interface & Navigation  ||  Introduction to 3Ds Max || 3D Modeling || Practice ||

Video Editing

items.headline: Using 3ds Max and Unreal 4, we'll take a look at building an introductory side-scrolling game!
objectives_summary: Learn to build a side scroller with 3ds Max and UE4
Learn the overview of building geometry for your level in 3ds Max

items.title: Blender: Product rendering for beginners.
items.headline: Understand lighting and create amazing renders with blender.
objectives_summary: What light is.
The importance of light.
The positioning of light.

items.title: Learn Blender Modeling and Texturing
items.headline: Learn Blender by working on real projects instead of just learning where the buttons are. Learn Blender the fun way.
objectives_summary: Navigate the 3D viewport
Move,scale, and rotate objects
Edit objects through extrusions, adding edgeloops, and knife tool

items.title: Mesmerizing Gifs and How to Make Them
items.headline: Create Mind-Bending Loops with After Effects and Photoshop
objectives_summary: At the end of my course, students will be able to create seamlessly looping gifs and videos, that are short and interesting. You’ll have learned the basics of After Effects; how to export animated gifs and videos to share on Instagram, Dribbble, and other social networks. You’ll have learned principles and theory that can be applied to your style and method of working.

You’ll learn the basics of After Effects. You’ll learn the theory behind making mesmerizing loops and given examples of how to do so in After Effects. You’ll learn how to export videos and gifs in Photoshop.

items.title: Camera Projections with Nuke
items.headline: Transform any 2D image into a 3D environment using Nuke
objectives_summary: Camera projection is a highly sought-after technique in the process of creating photo-realistic VFX. This course aims at making it simpler for the students to understand the process and learn the techniques involved in camera projections. By the end of the course, students will be able to take any 2D image and transform it into a 3D environment for compositing.

•	Using Blender 2.9 (the newest software version) and understanding its interface and shortcuts
•	Creating a stunning unique 3D Hobbit Door scene
